# `Record` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | `string` | Yes | The name of the record. |
| type | `string` | Yes | The type of the record. (Example values:  MX, TXT, CNAME) |
| value | `string` | Yes | The value of the record. |
